p: 3- O- α- l-arabinopyranosyl oleanolic acid-28- O-[ β- d-glucopyranosyl (1→6)- β- d-glucopyranosyl] ester ( 2). White amorphous powder; [α] d 20 + 35.0 (c 1.0, MeOH). IR (KBr) ν max 3398, 2988, 1728, 1066 and 1046 cm −1. 1H (600 MHz, pyridine- d 5 ) and 13C-NMR (150 MHz, pyridine- d 5 ) data, see supporting data, (Figures S8–S12); ESI-MS m/ z 930.5 [M + NH 4] + and 957.4 [M + HCOO −] −.
